scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 start dist/bot/app.js --name programmer-fa
scripts.restart: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 restart programmer-fa
scripts.sort: npm run build && node dist/cli/sort-words.js && git add --all ./src/data/ && git commit -m "Update words!"
scripts.test: tsc --outDir dist .mocharc.ts && cross-env NODE_ENV=testing DEBUG_MODE=true DB_ENABLE=false mocha --config dist/.mocharc.js --exit -b -r ts-node/register 'test/**/*.ts'
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist/data && cp src/data/* dist/data/ && cp .env dist
scripts.migrate:latest: npm run build && knex migrate:latest --knexfile dist/knexfile.js --migrations-directory dist/database/migrations
scripts.migrate:rollback: npm run build && knex migrate:rollback --knexfile dist/knexfile.js --migrations-directory dist/database/migrations
